conbody.p: A business type qualifies model attributes with a comprehensive business meaning.
For instance, an attribute based on the business type Amount has a clear business meaning, whereas one based on the simple primitive type decimal has none.

T24 Business types are created during import of application and local fields. After the import, a single file, located in: domain\businessTypes\BusinessTypes.domain , contains all T24 business types. Every new business type, application attribute or local field brings is automatically appended to the file, As a consequence, this file shouldn't be updated manually.
